The claim was posted on a satirical webs: com, which is known for intentionally providing false information.
The claim confuses the driver of the car: James Alex Fields Jr., with the organizer of the rally, Jason Kessler, who is rumored to have been a past Obama supporter.
The expert: s verdict clarifies that there is no evidence to support the claim that James Alex Fields Jr. visited Obama in the Oval Office or that he was a Democrat.
The Southern Poverty Law Center: SPLC) profile mentioned in the claim indicates that Jason Kessler, the rally organizer, may have had past involvement with the Occupy movement and support for President Obama, but it does not connect him to the act of running over a protester.
